Package view

Class SlideShowState

java.lang.Object
view.PhotoState
view.SlideShowState
public class SlideShowState
extends PhotoState
Substate that is accessed from the PhotoViewState when opening a photo in the list view. Class is used to implement the functionality of the SlideShowController.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class view.PhotoState

    lastEvent, photoController

      Specified by:

    • enter

      public void enter​(model.Photo p) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Accessed when opening a photo in the PhotoViewState. Sets the image to the image view and sets the SlideShowState to visible.
      Parameters:
      p - Selected photo.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException

    • processEvent

      public PhotoState processEvent()
      Method to process event of Button press. Implements next, prev, and back buttons.
      Specified by:
      processEvent in class PhotoState
      Returns:
      PhotoState representing the current state of the application.

    • leave

      public void leave()
      Method that sets the SlideShowState to non-visible.
      Specified by:
      leave in class PhotoState

    • setIndex

      public void setIndex​(int i)
      Sets current index of image listview, used when entering SlideShowState
      Parameters:
      i - int index.

    • setImage

      public void setImage​(model.Photo p) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Sets a photo onto the ImageView found within SlideShowController
      Parameters:
      p - Photo to be displayed.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException

    • centerImage

      public void centerImage()
      Helper method to center image to the middle of the image view. Called inside the setImage() method.
